name: Local Sirens: Recording Residencies
description: Local Sirens: Women in Music Performance Series is a free, all-ages quarterly performance series that features exceptional Bay Area women and gender-expansive musicians and performers Local Sirens supports predominately BIPOC artists who are creating new and innovative work that is representative of the diverse communities of the Bay Area.
fullDescription: Local Sirens: Women in Music Performance Series is a free, all-ages quarterly performance series that features exceptional Bay Area women and gender-expansive musicians and performers Local Sirens supports predominately BIPOC artists who are creating new and innovative work that is representative of the diverse communities of the Bay Area.
